title: An Epitaph For SCP-173
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:scp-pride]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
> Here lies a peanut.
> Known for snapping necks and pooping blood.
> Its image gone, the article not.
> But it was all for the greater good.
> The sacrifice was righteous, this we know.
> [[[licensing-guide|CC BY SA 3.0]]]
[[/=]]

author: Uncle Nicolini
